select b.* from ( select a.*, row_number() over (order by a.prod_id desc) rnum from( select prod_id, prod_status, prod_content, prod_day, prod_start, prod_end, prod_cs, prod_price, mem_id, p.company_id, prod_att, advert_name,c.company_name from prod p , company c where prod_status = '광고' and p.company_id = c.company_id order by prod_id desc ) a ) b
where b.rnum >= #{startRow} and b.rnum <= #{endRow}
